```{r include=FALSE}
###Setup
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

setwd('C:/Users/ZOU/Desktop/data_to_verify/Comparison')
cen_camp1  <- read_csv('central-burden-template.201910gavi-5.Cholera_campaign-default.csv')
cen_novax1 <- read_csv('central-burden-template.201910gavi-5.Cholera_no-vaccination.csv')
cen_camp2  <- read_csv('central-burden-template.201910gavi-5.Cholera-standard-template.306.csvcampaign-default.csv')
cen_novax2 <- read_csv('central-burden-template.201910gavi-5.Cholera-standard-template.306.csvno-vaccination.csv')

```



## Overview of cases in COD from two simulation results
```{r echo=FALSE}
###Comparison for COD
COD_camp1 <- cen_camp1 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  mutate(index = year*101 + age)
COD_camp1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(index, cases)) + 
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle('COD-cases-campaign scenario-previous') +
  ylim(-20, 2050)

COD_camp2 <- cen_camp2 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  mutate(index = year*101 + age)
COD_camp2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(index, cases)) + 
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle('COD-cases-campaign scenario-new') +
  ylim(-20, 2050)

COD_novax1 <- cen_novax1 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  mutate(index = year*101 + age)
COD_novax1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(index, cases)) + 
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle('COD-cases-no vaccination scenario-previous') +
  ylim(-20, 2050)

COD_novax2 <- cen_novax2 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  mutate(index = year*101 + age)
COD_novax2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(index, cases)) + 
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle('COD-cases-no vaccination scenario-new') +
  ylim(-20, 2050)

```



## Across-age-group cases in COD from two simulation results
```{r echo=FALSE}
COD_camp1 <- cen_camp1 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(cases = sum(cases), deaths = sum(deaths), dalys = sum(dalys)) %>% 
  select(year, cases, deaths, dalys)
COD_camp2 <- cen_camp2 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(cases2 = sum(cases), deaths2 = sum(deaths), dalys2 = sum(dalys)) %>% 
  select(year, cases2, deaths2, dalys2)
COD_camp <- full_join(COD_camp1, COD_camp2, id = 'year') %>% 
  gather(case_source, case_value, c(cases, cases2)) %>% 
  gather(death_source, death_value, c(deaths, deaths2)) %>% 
  gather(daly_source, daly_value, c(dalys, dalys2)) %>% 
  filter( (case_source == 'cases' &
           death_source == 'deaths' & 
           daly_source == 'dalys') | 
          (case_source == 'cases2' &
           death_source == 'deaths2' & 
           daly_source == 'dalys2')) %>% 
  mutate(source = case_source, cases = case_value, deaths = death_value, dalys = daly_value) %>% 
  mutate(source = case_when(source == 'cases' ~ 'Previous Simulation',
                            source == 'cases2' ~ 'New Simulation')) %>% 
  select(year, source, cases, deaths, dalys)

COD_camp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=cases, color = source)) +
    geom_point(size=1) + 
    theme_minimal() +
    ggtitle('COD-Campaign-Previous&New')
    


COD_novax1 <- cen_novax1 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(cases = sum(cases), deaths = sum(deaths), dalys = sum(dalys)) %>% 
  select(year, cases, deaths, dalys)
COD_novax2 <- cen_novax2 %>% 
  filter(country == 'COD') %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(cases2 = sum(cases), deaths2 = sum(deaths), dalys2 = sum(dalys)) %>% 
  select(year, cases2, deaths2, dalys2)
COD_novax <- full_join(COD_novax1, COD_novax2, id = 'year') %>% 
  gather(case_source, case_value, c(cases, cases2)) %>% 
  gather(death_source, death_value, c(deaths, deaths2)) %>% 
  gather(daly_source, daly_value, c(dalys, dalys2)) %>% 
  filter( (case_source == 'cases' &
           death_source == 'deaths' & 
           daly_source == 'dalys') | 
          (case_source == 'cases2' &
           death_source == 'deaths2' & 
           daly_source == 'dalys2')) %>% 
  mutate(source = case_source, cases = case_value, deaths = death_value, dalys = daly_value) %>% 
  mutate(source = case_when(source == 'cases' ~ 'Previous Simulation',
                            source == 'cases2' ~ 'New Simulation')) %>% 
  select(year, source, cases, deaths, dalys)

COD_novax %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=cases, color = source)) +
    geom_point(size=1) + 
    theme_minimal() +
    ggtitle('COD-NoVaccination-Previous&New')
```
